name: ZigZag Fantasy Run Lite
description:
Just tap and move the orb through the fantasy worlds and collect stars to unlock other worlds.
Easy to play and hard to master.
Challenge yourself in this amazing speed test game!


ZigZag Fantasy Run features:
- Awesome graphics that bring the best out of this casual game
- Simple yet challenging gameplay that requires quick reaction
- Different fantasy worlds to unlock.
- Zigzag paths rotate in all directions.
- Collect all the stars and unlock worlds.

How to play :
- Tap to switch directions.
- Collect the stars.
- Don't hit the wall!
